Description.Text:
Property Location
You'll be centrally located in Albi with a stay at Mercure Albi Bastides, minutes from Musee Toulouse-Lautrec and Albi Cathedral. This 4-star hotel is within the vicinity of Albi Golf Course and Florentin-Gaillac Golf Course.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 56 guestrooms featuring minibars. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have bathtubs and hair dryers. Conveniences include desks and blackout drapes/curtains, and you can also request irons/ironing boards.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and babysitting/childcare (surcharge).

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves lunch and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Planning an event in Albi? This hotel has facilities measuring 484 square feet (45 square meters), including conference space. Guests may use a roundtrip airport shuttle for a surcharge, and free self parking is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves lunch and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Musee Toulouse-Lautrec - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Albi Cathedral - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Albi Golf Course - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi

The preferred airport for Mercure Albi Bastides is Toulouse (TLS-Blagnac) - 70.5 km / 43.8 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Mercure Albi Bastides is Toulouse, France (TLS-Blagnac) - 70.7 km / 43.9 mi.
